attributes.action: Abolish the uper limit for paying National Insurance contributrions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
National Insurance is paid on earnings between a lower and upper limit, meaning that higher earners pay proportionally less than lower earners.

I propose that the upper limit be removed, so that NI contributions be paid on all earning above the lower limit.

At the same time, the rate of NI contributions should be lowered from 11% back to 10%
